title: United Arab Emirates - Tradeore.com (Roger K Olsson)
text: Jul 14, 2015 Sourcing Business in The Gulf Emirates, Dubai The United Arab Emirates (UAE) is one of the largest oil producing countries in the world, It is a country, rich in history and culture and of its 1.7 million people ranks as the world's richest country. The discovery of oil in 1966 turned Dubai from a quiet fishing and pearl-exporting town to a rich oil economy. Dubai is the richest city on earth, with major stakes in Western economies and is a growing and attractive market in the world for investment and business. Initially, free zones were created to attract foreign investment and promote foreign trade. In recent years, successful investments of oil wealth and the commercial confidence makes Dubai to world's most sustainable city. Dubai is a very popular destination of international tourists and also hosts many major sports events, among others the Dubai World Cup, which is the richest horse race in the world. A leading international design and building architecture of the main shopping malls, banks, trade centers, hotels, and Dubai International Airport provides an overwhelming impression of a location, whereby these advantages have created a major attraction of Dubai as a very popular destination also to corporate group head offices, trade finance services, and fund managers absolute top location. Not least for the knowledge source to pass on the knowledge from the traditional apprenticeship and versatility to undertake allocation activities in the forefront of trade. The company behind United Arab Emirates Tradeore.com was incorporated in 2015, of an international constellation and has its Financial Information Branch and subsidiary as part of a project to develop markets located in Dubai. Thus strategic business divisions of finance, audit and accounting professionals covering investment banking emerged to exploitation of mineral reserves and land management. Together with the headquarters in China and a number of partner networks of several prestigious scholars of Islamic law to create the trade and logistics community for free trade in gold for jewellery manufacturers, retailers and traders. These developments are in accordance to a fast-growing sector and knowledge of banking sectors and related regulation in the Gulf countries and abroad banking, investing, insurance, and consumer financial services custody, consulting and outsourcing. Economic analysis of the United Arab Emirates shows greater demand for gold out of which almost 90 per cent of the gold that refineries produce go to back investment products such as Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs) and gold futures on exchanges across the world. According to a DMCC data, a government agency that facilitates the trade of gold and other precious metals, trade of gold through Dubai stood at $ 8.33bn in Q1 2010. There is no doubt about Dubai as a potential refining hub for gold and it is no surprise to see gold and precious metal traders increasing their presence in this part of the Gulf. Investment management industry is a constantly growing and extremely impressive development in the global marketplace. International trade to and from Dubai flourish with laws and regulations that govern foreign investment in the United Arab Emirates as largely conducive to foreign investments. Thus long term investments reproves the way to huge opportunities for foreign trade and Dubai is one of world's 20 busiest cargo hubs. Freight volumes surged 177.3 per cent in Q1 2015 to 213,006 tonnes.To create conditions for further investments, international business, economic, and legal trends and developments over critical matters of national importance the official reports. The government of Dubai supports the improvement of foreign investments and offers the most profitable conditions for financial investment special economic zone and offshore companies rights, economical and political stability. The UAE possesses one of the most highly developed and industrialised economies. Infrastructure programs are constantly underway. May be additional reason to follow the events of the next few years.
